Summary: i was in my back yard and heard a hum and looked up and there it was
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to see what my dod was barking at .I heard a hum i looked up and there it was.a round silver disk i ran back in the house to get my cam the sound was getting weeker as i was coming out the back door it had moved across the yard and moved about a half mile i guess but i started taking flim of it my cam is a mini DVD just tought i would let you know..it started to change colors my son and i watched it for a little bit and it moved back and forth very fast i have never seen anything like it before it looked like it was coming back when all of sudden it flew stright up and was gone i have never seen anything move that fast in my life.i have seen USAF JETS FLY by here many times.they do runs on the power plant here at lake hyco somtimes
